title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-9.3 - Administrative responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-9.3 - Administrative responsibility

State Regulations

The director of a human milk bank shall ensure the development and implementation of policies and procedures consistent with this Part for the operation of the bank, and the appointment of a medical director and a medical advisory committee composed of physicians with experience in pediatrics, neonatology, blood banking, nutrition and/or other appropriate fields, including at least one member with expertise in infectious diseases, as well as other allied health personnel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
52-9.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
